name: The Old Kazulka
description: The Old Kazulka is an old-school arkanoid performed in the retro style of the games of the nineties. If you like the genre of Arkanoid, then you will definitely like it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory Storage: 21 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz or higer Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory Storage: 21 MB available space
